item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description:
"I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart)I am never without it (anywhere I go you go,my dear; and whatever is done by only me is your doing,my darling) I fear no fate (for you are my fate,my sweet)I want no world (for beautiful you are my world,my true) and it's you are whatever a moon has always meant and whatever a sun will always sing is you
here is the deepest secret nobody knows (here is the root of the root and the bud of the bud and the sky of the sky of a tree called life; which grows higher than the soul can hope or mind can hide) and this is the wonder that's keeping the stars apart
I carry your heart (I carry it in my heart)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Nothing ever fatigues me, but doing what I do not like." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Michel Legrand
item.description: "The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know." -- Michel Legrand

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Look after my heart - I've left it with you." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Zelda Fitzgerald
item.description: "Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold." -- Zelda Fitzgerald

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Blaise Pascal
item.description: "The heart has its reasons which reason knows not." -- Blaise Pascal

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet." -- Plato

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Let me not to the marriage of true minds Admit impediments. Love is not love Which alters when it alteration finds, Or bends with the remover to remove. O no, it is an ever-fixed mark That looks on tempests and is never shaken; It is the star to every wand'ring barque, Whose worth's unknown, although his height be taken. Love's not Time's fool, though rosy lips and cheeks Within his bending sickle's compass come; Love alters not with his brief hours and weeks, But bears it out even to the edge of doom. If this be error and upon me proved, I never writ, nor no man ever loved." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "A book is a gift you can open again and again." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Often on a wet day I begin counting up; what I've read and what I haven't read." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "It was as if I had thought all along I was a complete picture, and Sam had revealed that I was a puzzle, and had taken me apart into pieces and put me back together again. I was acutely aware of each distinct emotion, all fitting together tightly." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by William Ernest Henley
item.description:
"Out of the night that covers me, Black as the Pit from pole to pole, I thank whatever gods may be For my unconquerable soul.
In the fell clutch of circumstance I have not winced nor cried aloud. Under the bludgeonings of chance My head is bloody, but unbowed.
Beyond this place of wrath and tears Looms but the Horror of the shade, And yet the menace of the years Finds, and shall find, me unafraid.
It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul." -- William Ernest Henley

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "Maybe you can afford to wait. Maybe for you there's a tomorrow. Maybe for you there's one thousand tomorrows, or three thousand, or ten, so much time you can bathe in it, roll around it, let it slide like coins through you fingers. So much time you can waste it. But for some of us there's only today. And the truth is, you never really know." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by John Green
item.description: "At some point, you just pull off the Band-Aid, and it hurts, but then it's over and you're relieved." -- John Green

item.title: Shantal (Book Nerds are Pretty Too) add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "Is it possible for home to be a person and not a place?" -- Stephanie Perkins
